## OWebEvent.off() method

Removes event handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
off(event: string, handler: () => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | string | The event name. |
|  handler | () =&gt; void | The event handler function. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
